Mix_Fertilizer_Description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops and Greatly stimulating leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.
Intermix_Fertilizer_Description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops and Greatly stimulating leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.
Blend_Fertilizer_Description: Greatly Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops and Greatly stimulating leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 33%. Mix into tilled soil.
